mapper.select: SELECT c.company_id, c.company_name, i.intro_birth, i.intro_task, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_location, i.job_id, i.intro_image FROM company c LEFT OUTER JOIN intro i ON c.company_id = i.company_id WHERE c.company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE company c RIGHT JOIN intro i ON (i.company_id = c.company_id) SET c.company_name = #{companyName}, i.intro_birth = #{introBitrh}, i.intro_task = #{introTask}, i.intro_wellfare = #{introWellfare}, i.intro_content = #{introContent}, i.intro_location = #{introLocation}, i.job_id = #{jobId}, i.intro_image = #{introImage} WHERE c.company_id = #{companyId}
